text: Blanka Stajkow (born 23 May 1999) is a Polish-Bulgarian singer and model. She is known by her first name Blanka. == Eurovision Song Contest 2023 == In early 2023, Stajkow won the Polish national selection for the Eurovision Song Contest 2023, going on to represent the country with her song "Solo". Her selection caused controversy, due to people saying that the judges were corrupt and that they planned for Blanka to win. At Eurovision, Blanka placed 3rd in the second semi-final, meaning that she was one of 26 finalists. At the final, she finished in 19th place. == Discography == === Singles === * Better (2021) * Solo (2022) * Boys Like Toys (2023) * Rodeo (2023) == Sources == Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Polish singers Category:Eurovision Song Contest entrants Category:Pomeranian Voivodeship
title: Blanka Stajkow
